metadata.Title: CVE-2012-0797 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The webservices functionality in Moodle 2.0.x before 2.0.7, 2.1.x before 2.1.4, and 2.2.x before 2.2.1 allows remote authenticated users to bypass the deleted status and continue using a server via a token.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-0797` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 2.2.2.dfsg-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.2.2.dfsg-2').
